member.name: EC_ENDOFLINE
member.summary: Indicates the end of line character used by an edit control.

member.name: EC_ENDOFLINE.EC_ENDOFLINE_DETECTFROMCONTENT
member.summary: End of line character specified in content.

member.name: EC_ENDOFLINE.EC_ENDOFLINE_CRLF
member.summary: End of line character is CRLF.

member.name: EC_ENDOFLINE.EC_ENDOFLINE_CR
member.summary: End of line character is CR.

member.name: EC_ENDOFLINE.EC_ENDOFLINE_LF
member.summary: End of line character is LF.
